# Content is auto generated
# Manual changes will be overwritten!
title: Navbar
---
This component organizes views into top and bottom sections
within a vertical navigation bar, which can be shown or hidden.

## Constructors
### Navbar
Navbar creates a new TNavbar with visibility enabled by default.

---
## Methods
| Method | Description |
|--------| ------------|
| `Bottom(views ...)` | Bottom sets the bottom section of the navbar to the given views. |
| `Top(views ...)` | Top sets the top section of the navbar to the given views. |
---
